name: The Energetic Agriculture Podcast - Electroculture, Magnetoculture & Beyond!
host: Electroculture Growers - David Wechsler & Ray-Lee Bacon
description: The focus of our show is to teach and discuss the various aspects of growing plants with electricity, magnetism, and subtle energies, etc. We’ve experimenting and writing about electroculture since 2010 and we're eager to share our discoveries with you! electroculture.substack.com

recent_episodes.title: garden symmetry as fractalized light
recent_episodes.description: This is a public episode. If you'd like to discuss this with other subscribers or get access to bonus episodes, visit electroculture.substack.com/subscribe

recent_episodes.title: The Potato Prophet who Sat on a Cactus
recent_episodes.description:
The Man Who Spoke to Plants — And They Actually Listened

What would you say about a man who could sit…on a cactus…in front of a live audience...

…and not move. Not flinch. Not bleed.

Because the cactus had no spines.

Not because he found it.But because he made it that way.

Meet Luther Burbank

A botanist who didn’t just grow plants.He talked to them.

And in ways science still can’t explain…they talked back.

Sounds Impossible? Too Mystical?

<..

recent_episodes.title: Steel Kills. Copper Brings Life.
recent_episodes.description:
If you’ve been in our community for a while, you’ve probably seen the name Viktor Schauberger pop up.Whenever we post about him—engagement spikes—comments flood in.It’s no wonder.

He’s a legend in electroculture circles.

score_reason: Focuses on pseudoscientific alternative agriculture methods (electroculture, magnetism) rather than business, marketing, or practical AI applications in agriculture.
